00020 
00040 public class UsingSingleBuffer {
00041 
00042         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043         // Generate the Java code for your Protobuf object
00044         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045         
00046         // 1. Create the schema of your object (MyProtobufObject.proto text file).
00047         //
00048         // option java_package = "de.aitools.aq.invertedindex.usage";
00049         //
00050         // message Person {
00051         //        required int32 id = 1;
00052         //        required string name = 2;
00053         //        optional string email = 3;
00054         // }
00055         //
00056         // 2. Compile that text file to generate the Java code of this object.
00057         //
00058         // $ protoc --java_out=. MyProtobufObject.proto
00059         //
00060         // 3. Import the generated MyProtobufObject.java file into your project.
00061 
00062         public static void main(String[] args)
00063         throws InvalidProtocolBufferException {
00064                 
00065                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00066                 // Setup the Indexer
00067                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00068                 Configuration config = new Configuration();
00069                 config.setIndexDirectory(new File("/path/to/your/index"));
00070                 config.setKeySorting(KeySorting.UNSORTED);      // optional, see doc
00071                 config.setMaxMemoryUsage(Memory.MB1024);        // optional, see doc
00072                 // Note config.setValueSorting(...) has no effect
00073                 
00074                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00075                 // Instantiate a new Indexer
00076                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00077                 Class<SingleBuffer> valueClass = SingleBuffer.class;
00078                 Indexer<SingleBuffer> indexer = Indexer.open(valueClass, config);
00079                 
00080                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00081                 // Create some Person objects and put them into the indexer
00082                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00083                 for (int i = 0; i != Short.MAX_VALUE; ++i) {
00084                         // Create some key
00085                         String key = "key" + (i % Byte.MAX_VALUE);
00086                         // Create some value
00087                         Person.Builder builder = Person.newBuilder();
00088                         builder.setName("John Doe #" + i);
00089                         builder.setEmail("john.doe@uni-weimar.de #" + i);
00090                         builder.setId(i);
00091                         Person person = builder.build();
00092                         SingleBuffer value = new SingleBuffer(person.toByteArray());
00093                         // Create and put the record
00094                         indexer.put(new Record<SingleBuffer>(key, value));
00095                 }
00096                 
00097                 indexer.index(); // be patient ...
00098                 
00099                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00100                 // Open the inverted index
00101                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00102                 Searcher<SingleBuffer> searcher = Searcher.open(valueClass, config);
00103                 
00104                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00105                 // Search the inverted index
00106                 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00107                 Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
00108                 while (true) {
00109                         System.out.print("Enter key (type 'q' to exit) : ");
00110                         String key = scanner.nextLine();
00111                         if (key.equals("q")) break;
00112                         Postlist<SingleBuffer> postlist = searcher.search(key);
00113                         if (postlist != null) {
00114                                 for (SingleBuffer value : postlist) {
00115                                         Person person = Person.parseFrom(value.getBuffer().array());
00116                                         System.out.println(person);
00117                                 }
00118                                 postlist.deleteNative(); // This is essential, do not forget !
00119                         } else {
00120                                 System.out.println("Nothing found");
00121                         }
00122                 }
00123                 searcher.close();
00124         }
00125 
00126 }
